HELP:
[CMD_KEY]sendcash @player amount (optional message)

Sends some cash to another player.
Note: The maximum amount someone can receive is ten times their limit.

Example usage:

[CMD_KEY]sendcash @DeveloperAnonymous 1000000 "for the lit bot fam"

or

[CMD_KEY]sendcash @PolarBear 1
SAMEPLAYER: There is no reason to send money to yourself!
HIGHER:
You do not have **%s**!
The maximum you can transfer is **%s**
CANTAFFORD:
**%s** is more than ten times **%s**'s limit!
The maximum **%s** can receive is **%s**!
BROKE: You do not have any money to transfer!
